snippet: The tabletop guitarist Keith Rowe improvised in duets with Graham Lambkin and Michael Pisaro as part of the Amplify 2013: Rotation festival at the Temp art space.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by tabletop guitarist Keith Rowe as part of Amplify 2013: Rotation festival at Temp art space.
lead_paragraph: The tabletop guitarist Keith Rowe improvised in duets with Graham Lambkin and Michael Pisaro as part of the Amplify 2013: Rotation festival at the Temp art space.

headline.seo: Keith Rowe With Graham Lambkin and Michael Pisaro at Temp
headline.main: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Guitar and Sound
